author: LauraShad

review: Here's what I originally thought: 1 StarI'd rate the Plex app on Fire TV zero stars if I could.The Plex app on Fire TV doesn't work.  Oh, sure, you can download the Plex app to your Fire TV, and sign into your Plex account, but once you start playing a video, it doesn't take long before the video freezes for a second or two before it continues playing, again.  And then, within a few seconds, the video freezes on the screen, again.  What a BIG disappointment!I've read Amazon's support for apps on their products is poor, and now I believe it.Here's what I think now ... 5 Stars!I've changed my rating to 5 stars because after I followed the instructions at amazon.com/firetvsupport, Quick Fixes, Video issues on Your Fire TV Device, I'm no longer having video issues using the Plex app. Everything in Plex is working as it should.  My videos play flawlessly via the Plex app in Fire TV.

review: Easy to install and use.  The remote is tiny and difficult to open to apply batteries.  I had to go back to Amazon reviews to find out that the remote opens by sliding down.  I used a table knife to get it open because it is tough to open.  I gave this product five stars because once you get the remote set, the Amazon Fire TV box makes watching movies easy!  Afterall, if you are paying for the Prime membership, why not take advantage of watching these movies for free on your big screen TV instead of a computer.  I love mine!
